intro: Ultramarine armies gain 12 formation points (F/p), 5 upgrade points (U/p), 3 War Engine points (WE/p), and 3 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle.
strategy: Legiones Astartes armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All Ultramarine Detachments and Collegia Titanica allied Banners have an initiative of 1+. Battle Automata Detachments have an initiative of 2+. Solar Auxilia allied Tercios have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia allied Lances have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.
armyRules: The Dauntless special rule applies to all Ultramarine Detachments and Collegia Titanica Banners.
